Expect a line for some good sandwiches (bocadillos) which are recognized by many as the best in Barcelona.Very simple, but very good.  Hearty and well seasoned chunks of grilled chicken cooked to order, fresh vegetables, and dressed with a couple of sauces in a baguette.  It can get pretty messy with ingredients falling out everywhere when you eat it, but it really just shows how they aren't trying to skimp you on the fillings by just selling you a piece of bread.
